de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.semwebclient.urisearch
Class URISearchTaskQueue

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.semwebclient.threadutils.TaskQueueBase
          de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.semwebclient.urisearch.URISearchTaskQueue
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class URISearchTaskQueue
extends TaskQueueBase

A queue of URI search tasks (URISearchTask objects) that manages threads (URISearchThread objects) which execute the queued tasks. This queue is implemented as a thread itself. It observes the search threads: it tries to assign new tasks to free search threads and interrupts search threads if the timeout is reached.

Author:
Olaf Hartig
